pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flake8 pytest plugin====================Check for uses of Django-style assert-statements in tests. So no more ``self.assertEqual(a, b)``,but instead ``assert a == b``.This module provides a plugin for ``flake8``, the Python code checker.Installation------------You can install or upgrade ``flake8-pytest`` with these commands:: $ pip install flake8-pytest $ pip install --upgrade flake8-pytestPlugin for Flake8-----------------When both ``flake8`` and ``flake8-pytest`` are installed, the plugin isavailable in ``flake8``:: $ flake8 --version 2.0 (pep8: 1.4.5, flake8-pytest: 1.1, pyflakes: 0.6.1)
